name: choisya
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a kind of evergreen bush (= one that never loses its leaves), with shiny leaves and white flowers that smell very sweet: Choisya can make a good hedge with deliciously scented white flowers, and is really tough. I've read that pruning choisyas is unnecessary.
More examplesFewer examplesThe lime green leaves of the compact shrub Choisya ternata "Sundance" provide a welcome splash of light in the winter garden.Choisya, mahonia, and berberis are very difficult to move once established.
